  • Uses of PlayStrategy in fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies

    Classes in fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies that implement PlayStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CPUStrategy
    Concrete CPU strategy.
    class 
    DefensiveStrategy
    This strategy will be chosen by the CPUPlayer when they feel threatened : If the game is tied, if the leading players are far above in score, if this player has no cards left, or if this player plays as a witch and is not close to victory.
    final class 
    GropingStrategy
    The initial strategy of all CPU-controlled players, and the one adopted when the situation is not clear enough to choose a more angular strategy.
    class 
    OffensiveStrategy
    This strategy will be chosen by the CPUPlayer if they are in good position (score close to 5, well ranked, or has a lot of cards).
